WorkItem.Description:
Please provide comprehensive code sample in C# demonstrating the use of IronPython in simple case to more complex cases. I seen too many old code and method using IronPython before VS2010, which is confusing.
Â 
I have successfully use simple code sample, but remains open for many improvement in code sample and demo use, the current documentation (in context of how/demo) looks very limited. It need to be clear the code is written for .NET4 and VS2010 (not VS2008 or earlier method which seem to use process library).
